name: Chatseat
description:
What if Twitch chat drove a car?

Chatseat has singleplayer controls as well as chat command controls. When a chat  message begins with the letters W, A, S, or D, they should be treated as that command. The weight each chat message has is dependent on how many people are actively sending commands.

In order to connect to Twitch chat you need your username and an OAuth key. I use https://twitchapps.com/tmi/ to get mine but there are other ways as well. MAKE SURE YOU DO NOT SHARE YOUR OAUTH KEY WITH ANYONE.

Chatseat currently has 16 main levels as well as a level editor with the option to play custom levels.

More main levels are planned for future releases as well as sound effects and possibly a way to upload custom levels.
